https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2MhdnNWshZ16LKfKwkteV123Jne.jpg The big day has come. Grandpa Herbert Maibach has become obsolete. Spending the last years in a coma, he didn’t exactly cover himself in glory. The family gathers to say their goodbyes. Easier said than done… Der große Tag
